## InputProcessorDefinition.id property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Identifier for this processor within the plugin. Combined with plugin ID to form `{pluginId}:{processorId}`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly id: string;
```
